H0.text: In 1746, Scottish naval surgeon James Lind pioneered the treatment of which disease. Malaria

H1.text: In 1746, Scottish naval surgeon James Lind pioneered the treatment of which disease. Scurvy-like disease (but not the actual disease)

H2.text: In 1746, Scottish naval surgeon James Lind pioneered the treatment of which disease. Dysentery

H3.text: In 1746, Scottish naval surgeon James Lind pioneered the treatment of which disease. Scruvy

A4.text: he developed the theory that citrus fruits cured scurvy

A5.text: he conducted an experiment on the prevention and treatment of scurvy while that ship was patrolling the Bay of Biscay
